Terrance Kiro sentenced for the manslaughter of Kaikohe grandmother Linda Woods https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/terrance-kiro-sentenced-for-the-manslaughter-of-kaikohe-grandmother-linda-woods/XF5GNA7IQFFU5KJCZKHHSLQKQE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/terrance-kiro-sentenced-for-the-manslaughter-of-kaikohe-grandmother-linda-woods/XF5GNA7IQFFU5KJCZKHHSLQKQE/ Denise PiperLinda Woods died last year after a man from her street entered her Kaikohe home. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:47:24 +0000 Linda Woods died when her dialysis valve was pulled out during a confrontation with Terrance Kiro, who entered her home shared with her daughter, two granddaughters and her great-grandchild.
Waikato road closures: SH3 Awakino Gorge to undergo maintenance work https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-road-closures-sh3-awakino-gorge-to-undergo-maintenance-work/QDSNT7THXZDZLALUPUCHBZX5FI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-road-closures-sh3-awakino-gorge-to-undergo-maintenance-work/QDSNT7THXZDZLALUPUCHBZX5FI/ Three days of partial closures are planned for Awakino Gorge, Waitomo. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:00:00 +0000 From April 30 to May 2, the Awakino Gorge will be closed from 10am to 2pm due to maintenance work.

Photo / Mark Mitchell

Concert-goer Lochie Jones struck by car, left for dead, on Wellington road https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/concert-goer-lochie-jones-struck-by-car-left-for-dead-on-wellington-road/GU2YS3UWPBDRTPGXRZE6BLAUYE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/concert-goer-lochie-jones-struck-by-car-left-for-dead-on-wellington-road/GU2YS3UWPBDRTPGXRZE6BLAUYE/ Rachel Maher'It looks like he’s been through [an] industrial machine, smashing his body around.' Tue, 23 Apr 2024 00:28:32 +0000 Lochie Jones suffered a broken sternum, broken vertebrae, cracked and broken teeth, internal bleeding and damage to several organs among other serious injuries.
